name: Thermal Space Suit
pages: This is the space suit for the low mass, thin atmosphere planets!$(br2)Wearing the complete thermal space suit will also give a small speed effect.

pages.text: Wearing the thermal space suit boots will turn off the low gravity effects on the low mass planets like the moon and Mars.$(br2)The boots also can be used to walk on powdered snow.
pages.title: Thermal Boots
